trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Out-Printer
trans-unit.target: Out-printer

trans-unit.source: Out-Printer
trans-unit.target: Out-printer

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Sends output to a printer.
trans-unit.target: 將輸出傳送到印表機。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Out-Printer** cmdlet sends output to the default printer or to an alternate printer, if one is specified.
trans-unit.target: **Out-printer** cmdlet 將輸出傳送到預設印表機或替代印表機，如果指定的話。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Print the content of a help topic to the default printer
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 列印至預設印表機的 [說明] 主題的內容

trans-unit.source: This command prints the content of the about_Signing Help topic to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 這個命令會將 about_Signing 說明主題的內容列印至預設印表機。

trans-unit.source: This example shows you how to print a file, even though **Out-Printer** does not have a *Path* parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此範例將示範如何列印檔案，即使 **Out-printer** 沒有 *路徑* 參數。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Get-Content cmdlet to get the contents of the Help topic.
trans-unit.target: 命令使用 Get-Content Cmdlet 取得說明主題的內容。

trans-unit.source: The path includes $pshome, a built-in variable that stores the installation directory for Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 路徑包含 $pshome，這是儲存 Windows PowerShell 安裝目錄的內建變數。

trans-unit.source: A pipeline operator (|) passes the results to **Out-Printer**, which sends it to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 管線運算子 (|) 會傳遞至結果 **Out-printer**, ，這將它傳送到預設印表機。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Print text to an alternative printer
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 替代的印表機列印文字

trans-unit.source: This command prints Hello, World to the Prt-6B Color printer on Server01.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會列印 Hello，World 到 Server01 Prt 6B Color 印表機。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the *Name* parameter to specify the alternate printer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 *名稱* 參數來指定替代印表機。

trans-unit.source: Because the parameter name is optional, you can omit it.
trans-unit.target: 因為參數名稱為選擇性，所以您可以省略它。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Print the full version of a help topic to the default printer
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 列印至預設印表機的 [說明] 主題的完整版本

trans-unit.source: These commands print the full version of the Help topic for Get-WmiObject.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令會列印 Get-WmiObject 說明主題的完整版本。

trans-unit.source: The first command uses the Get-Help cmdlet to get the full version of the Help topic for **Get-WmiObject** and stores it in the $H variable.
trans-unit.target: 第一個命令使用 Get-help cmdlet 取得 [說明] 主題的完整版本 **Get-wmiobject** 並將它儲存在 $H 變數。

trans-unit.source: The second command sends the content to the default printer.
trans-unit.target: 第二個命令將內容傳送到預設印表機。

trans-unit.source: It uses the InputObject parameter to pass the value of the $H variable to **Out-Printer**.
trans-unit.target: 它使用 InputObject 參數來傳遞 $H 變數的值 **Out-printer**。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: -InputObject
trans-unit.target: -InputObject

trans-unit.source: Specifies the objects to be sent to the printer.
trans-unit.target: 指定要傳送到印表機的物件。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains the objects, or type a command or expression that gets the objects.
trans-unit.target: 輸入包含物件的變數，或輸入可取得物件的命令或運算式。

trans-unit.source: -Name
trans-unit.target: -Name

trans-unit.source: Specifies the alternate printer.
trans-unit.target: 指定替代印表機。

trans-unit.source: The parameter name *Name* is optional.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱 *名稱* 是選擇性的。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.PSObject
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.PSObject

trans-unit.source: You can pipe any object to **Out-Printer**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用管線傳送任何物件至 **Out-printer**。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: **Out-Printer** does not return any objects.
trans-unit.target: **Out-printer** 不會傳回任何物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: You can also refer to **Out-Printer** by its built-in alias, **lp**.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以參考 **Out-printer** 內建的別名， **lp**。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Aliases.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Aliases。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlets that contain the Out verb do not format objects; they just render them and send them to the specified display destination.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Out 動詞的 cmdlet 不會格式化物件;只會轉譯它們並將它們傳送至指定的顯示目的地。

trans-unit.source: If you send an unformatted object to an Out cmdlet, the cmdlet sends it to a formatting cmdlet before rendering it.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將未格式化的物件傳送到 Out Cmdlet，該 Cmdlet 就會先將它傳送到格式化 Cmdlet，然後才轉譯它。

trans-unit.source: The Out cmdlets do not have parameters for names or file paths.
trans-unit.target: Out Cmdlet 沒有任何名稱或檔案路徑的參數。

trans-unit.source: To send data to an Out cmdlet, use a pipeline operator (|) to send the output of a Windows PowerShell command to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要將資料傳送給 Out Cmdlet，請使用管線運算子 (|) 將 Windows PowerShell 命令的輸出傳送給此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: You can also store data in a variable and use the *InputObject* parameter to pass the data to the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 也可以將資料儲存在變數中並使用在 *InputObject* 將資料傳遞給 cmdlet 的參數。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the examples.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱範例。

trans-unit.source: **Out-Printer** sends data, but it does not emit any output objects.
trans-unit.target: **Out-printer** 傳送資料，但它不會發出任何輸出物件。

trans-unit.source: If you pipe the output of **Out-Printer** to Get-Member, **Get-Member** reports that no objects have been specified.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用管線傳送的輸出 **Out-printer** 至 Get-member， **Get-member** 報告尚未指定任何物件。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.target: Out-Default

trans-unit.target: Out-file

trans-unit.target: Out-Host

trans-unit.target: Out-Null
